rows.label: qst703301_msg0001
rows.name: Oho! Well if it isn't Laura and Adel!

rows.label: qst703301_msg0002
rows.name: Tarath! Didn't expect to find you here!

rows.label: qst703301_msg0003
rows.name: What happened to guarding the garden?

rows.label: qst703301_msg0004
rows.name:
Ah, well now, I took a nasty old hit
in the attack the other day and my
legs aren't what they used to be.

rows.label: qst703301_msg0005
rows.name:
Long story short, I've been
reassigned to Iira's Womb.

rows.label: qst703301_msg0006
rows.name: Oh, really? I'm sorry to hear that.

rows.label: qst703301_msg0007
rows.name:
Are you OK? That must have
been simply awful for you.

rows.label: qst703301_msg0008
rows.name:
Don't go giving me those sad eyes, miss!
It's not as bad as all that. I'll be
right as rain with a bit of time.

rows.label: qst703301_msg0009
rows.name:
I sometimes get to catch up with
Master Seiryu, and he regales me with
war stories. So it's not all bad!

rows.label: qst703301_msg0011
rows.name:
He does! As you might imagine, what
with him being 800 years old and all,
he's seen a lot of stuff in his time.

rows.label: qst703301_msg0012
rows.name:
Like that story he told me
the other day about that
fabulous hoard of money...

rows.label: qst703301_msg0014
rows.name: Oh, er, well, um... *Cough cough cough*

rows.label: qst703301_msg0015
rows.name:
That reminds me! Master Seiryu
said that if I saw you, I
should send you to him.

rows.label: qst703301_msg0016
rows.name:
He should be in Iira's Womb, if
you want to pop along there.

rows.label: qst703301_msg0017
rows.name:
My legs need a bit of rest so I'm
going to head back to my post.
